numbered_ace_sentences: 1. This is Wednesday's live moderation of "What’s Going On in This Graph?".
2. Today's graph relates optimism between generations about the future.
3. The graph includes people from 21 countries.
4. From 9 am to 2 pm E.T. today, you can share responses online.
5. You can answer the question "What do you notice?".
6. You can answer the question "What do you wonder?".
7. You can answer the question "How will this affect you?".
8. You can share a catchy headline.
9. The catchy headline captures the ideas in this graph.
10. By Friday morning, we will reveal the article that included this graph.
11. The article includes this graph and much more.
12. We look forward to reading your discoveries.
13. You can get a link to your response.
14. You can share the link with your teacher.
15. You can share the link with your classmates.
16. You can click the response box below your response.
17. You can click "Email me when my comment is published.".
18. You can visit the archive.
19. The archive shows all graphs in this series.
20. The archive is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphs.
21. You can view the archives that link to all past releases.
22. The past releases are organized by topic.
23. The topic index is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsTopicIndex.
24. The past releases are organized by graph type.
25. The graph type index is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsTypeIndex.
26. The past releases are organized by Stat Nugget.
27. The Stat Nugget index is at tinyurl.com/NYTGraphsStatNuggetsIndex.
28. The next "What’s Going On In This Graph?" will be released by Friday, Feb. 11.
29. The next moderation will be on Wednesday, Feb. 16.
30. The topic is weddings.
31. You should keep noticing.
32. You should keep wondering.
